metadata.persona: A digital marketing strategist at a mid-sized FMCG company aiming to improve brand awareness and customer engagement. Experienced in data-driven campaigns, social media marketing, and SEO. Keeps up with trends in content strategy and AI-based personalization.
metadata.job_to_be_done: Looking for insights on effective digital marketing strategies, performance metrics, and future technologies like AI, AR/VR for branding. Interested in challenges and best practices in social media, email, and content marketing to increase brand visibility and consumer trust.
